bug.author: srikris
bug.summary: Jupiter notebook doesn't show scatter plots inline (pops open in a new window)

comments.comment: Same applies to box plots and categorical heatmaps. <denchmark-code>turicreate.show(turicreate.SArray(range(10), str), turicreate.SArray(range(10), str)) turicreate.show(turicreate.SArray(range(10), int), turicreate.SArray(range(10), str)) </denchmark-code>
